mapper.sql: id, api_classifi_id, name, method, url, create_user, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT api.id as apiId,api.name as apiName,api.method as apiMethod,api.url as apiUrl,api_classification.name as apiClassifiName from api,api_classification WHERE api.api_classifi_id=api_classification.id AND api_classification.project_id=#{projectId};

SELECT api.id as apiId,api.name as apiName,api.method as apiMethod,api.url as apiUrl,api_classification.name as apiClassifiName from api,api_classification WHERE api.api_classifi_id=api_classification.id AND api_classification.id=#{apiClassificationId};
SELECT api_classification.name as firstLevelMenu, api.name as secondLevelMenu FROM api INNER JOIN api_classification ON api.api_classifi_id = api_classification.id WHERE api.id = #{apiId};

SELECT api.name as apiName,api.method as apiMethod,api.url as apiUrl,user.username as createUser,api.create_time as createUser FROM api LEFT JOIN user ON user.id = api.create_user WHERE api.id = #{apiId};
